sentences.en: A few faint gleams of sunshine lit up the gloomy afternoon.
sentences.cn: 几束隐约的阳光使阴暗的下午有些明亮.
一年四季阳光灿烂的岛

sentences.en: Bob woke slowly to sunshine pouring in his window.
sentences.cn: 直到阳光从窗外泻入，鲍勃才慢慢醒来。

sentences.en: Her visit brought a ray of sunshine into the old man's life.
sentences.cn: 她的来访给这位老人的生活带来了欢乐.

sentences.en: I got dressed and emerged into glorious sunshine.
sentences.cn: 我穿好衣服，走进灿烂的阳光中。

sentences.en: In the marina yachts sparkle in the sunshine.
sentences.cn: 码头上游艇在阳光下闪闪发光。

sentences.en: Inside it's gloomy after all that sunshine.
sentences.cn: 尽管阳光明媚，里面依然暗淡无光。

sentences.en: Morning sunshine flooded in through the open curtains.
sentences.cn: 清晨的阳光透过拉开的窗帘照射进来。

sentences.en: That was a week of alternate rain and sunshine.
sentences.cn: 那是晴雨天交替的一周.

sentences.en: The air was thin and crisp, filled with hazy sunshine and frost.
sentences.cn: 空气稀薄清新，其间日光蒙眬，寒气逼人。

sentences.en: The fresh breeze and bright sunshine quickly attracted Sophia.
sentences.cn: 清新的微风和明亮的阳光很快就使索菲娅着迷了.

sentences.en: The leaves are inclined to scorch in hot sunshine.
sentences.cn: 叶子在酷热的阳光下容易枯黄。

sentences.en: The petals of many flowers expand in the sunshine.
sentences.cn: 许多花瓣在阳光下开放.

sentences.en: We had three days of spring sunshine.
sentences.cn: 我们享受了三天的春日阳光。

sentences.en: We sat basking in the warm sunshine.
sentences.cn: 我们坐着享受温暖的阳光。

words.tran_cn: 阳光充足的，和煦的；快活的；性情开朗的
晴朗的；阳光照耀的；向阳极好的
阳光照射，阳光充足；活泼

phrases.tran_cn: n. 阳光小美女（电影名称）

trans.tran_cn: 阳光，日光，晴朗，晴天，太阳晒着的地方，欢乐
trans.tran_en: the light and heat that come from the sun when there is no cloud
